attributes.action: more reasearch into the link between candida and ME,Physicians consider candida when people dont fit patterns of  conventional illnesses
attributes.additional_details: Traditional medicine, fails to understand that multiple causes appear to cause ME, one of which is candida,this awful condition seems to be misunderstood by the medicial profession ,we need independent observant physicians who accept that intestinal candida needs alot more research, physicians should consider candida as a  cause, when people say I feel sick all over but whos symptoms dont fit the patterns of conventional illnesses,please consider candida, WE NEED MORE RESEARCH NOW   Thank You Janet Smith
